title: Multimedia-Based University Self-Directed Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Configuration of a work-integrated learning environment for current practitioners, with continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can self-directively learn at least two weekly math concepts using multimedia materials (videos, simulations, etc.)
Learners can perform collaborative problem-solving with peer learners at least once weekly via online discussion boards
Learners can revise and improve learning plans based on formative assessment analysis with over 80% participation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
